statements: SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products
SELECT * FROM products WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM products
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Chair';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM products WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT product_name, location FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, location FROM products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_level
SELECT product_id, location_id, quantity FROM inventory_level WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT location_id, product_id, quantity FROM inventory_level ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM product_location WHERE aisle_number = 3 AND shelf_number = 2
SELECT product_id, location_id FROM product_location WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT * FROM inventory_level WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY location_id, product_id DESC
SELECT product_id, location_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_level GROUP BY product_id, location_id HAVING total_quantity > 500

SELECT DISTINCT product_id, location_id FROM product_location INNER JOIN inventory_level ON product_location.product_id = inventory_level.product_id AND product_location.location_id = inventory_level.location_id WHERE aisle_number < 5 AND shelf_number > 3

SELECT * FROM inventory_level LEFT JOIN product_location ON inventory_level.product_id = product_location.product_id AND inventory_level.location_id = product_location.location_id WHERE aisle_number IS NULL
SELECT location_id, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM inventory_level GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 2 ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM products
SELECT * FROM locations
SELECT product_id, location_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE location='Warehouse A'
SELECT location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT products.name, inventory.quantity, locations.location_name FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id INNER JOIN locations ON inventory.location_id = locations.id;

SELECT products.name, inventory.quantity, locations.location_name FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id INNER JOIN locations ON inventory.location_id = locations.id WHERE inventory.quantity > 50 ORDER BY products.name DESC;
SELECT products.name, AVG(inventory.quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id GROUP BY products.name ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, location_name FROM products JOIN locations ON products.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT inventory_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory JOIN products ON inventory.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, location_id FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE location_id = 1;

SELECT product_name, location_name FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN locations ON inventory.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY product_name DESC;

SELECT product_name, location_name FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN locations ON inventory.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND quantity <= 50;

SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, location_name FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN locations ON inventory.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE quantity > 20 ORDER BY location_name ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, location FROM products JOIN warehouse_logs ON products.product_id = warehouse_logs.warehouse_id WHERE log_type = 'shipment' AND log_datetime > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM products WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT product_name, warehouse_name, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory_tracking ON products.product_id = inventory_tracking.product_id JOIN warehouses ON inventory_tracking.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id WHERE quantity < 20 OR warehouse_name = 'Warehouse A';

SELECT product_name, category_name, last_updated FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.category_id WHERE last_updated > '2022-04-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
